title: Lyndon B Johnson National Historical Park: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       All Areas of the Park  Summer in Texas can be hot. Drink plenty of water, wear a hat and sunscreen, and take it easy.  Do not climb on farm equipment. Cattle and horses can be unpredictable. Please do not attempt to feed, pet, or ride them.  Nature can pose hazards; stay on trails and be aware of fire ants, cacti, armadillo holes, etc.   At the LBJ Ranch  Speed limit is 25 mph unless otherwise posted. Stay on paved roads and follow the tour route. Much of the route is one-way traffic only. Pull off only at designated turn-outs. Cattle have the right-of-way.
